MS black-edged; M's brother-in-law, Eduard Wehl, had died on 11 February 1876. 14/6/76

Would you have the kindness, dear Mr Ramsay, to send me a copy of each of the school books, adopted at the State Schools, so that I may see, how far their form can be adopted for the intended school flora.
On 21 June 1876 Ramsay minuted: 'Forward copies'. A further annotation explains: 'i.e. Reading books from 2nd upwards'. On 27 June, the file was annotated: 'copies of 2d, 3d, 4th & 5th Reading books sent with letter [SB] 76/109'. — find this letter at PRO.
